attributes.action: introduce legislation to change the law concerning convicted criminals to ensure that all rights which accrue to the law-abiding people of this country, both civil and human, are suspended for the duration of their time in prison.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Convicted and imprisoned criminals  are using their sentences - with the complicity of this government which introduced the HRA - to enrich themselves at the expense of the people directly affected by the crimes which got them convicted AND the taxpayer. Suspension of human and civil rights should be mandatory and automatic upon receipt of a sentence of imprisonment to ensure that criminal activity and any subsequent punishment is not seen by others as a quick, comfortable, route to enrichment.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
